comment.body: What do you do on i2p? I tried it once, but didn't see anything interesting.
They seem to have very high ambitions, so I can understand. Did you try the alpha?

If there's a maximum length for password, I always assume they store it in plaintext. Another explanation might be that they don't want to be DDoS'ed by someone sending a 1 GB password (but then you should still set the limit around 100+ characters).
